item.title: 欧盟法院宣布拒绝与辉瑞公司竞购欧盟冯德莱恩疫苗信息
item.description: 欧洲二审法院周三驳回了《纽约时报》对欧盟委员会提出的调阅欧盟委员会主席乌苏拉-冯-德莱恩（Ursula von der Leyen）与辉瑞公司首席执行官阿尔伯特-布尔拉（Albert Bourla）之间关于购买数十亿欧元 COVID-19 疫苗的短信的请求。【原文：Europe's second-top court on Wednesday dismissed the European Commission's rejection of a New York Times' request to access text messages between its President Ursula von der Leyen and Pfizer CEO Albert Bourla on the purchase of billions of euros of COVID-19 vaccines.】

item.title: 英国 Co-Op 公司称网络事件后系统运行正常
item.description: 英国 Co-Op 集团表示，其系统目前运行正常，从本周末开始，商店和网上的存货供应将得到改善，所有形式的支付都能正常进行，并提供了最近披露的网络事件的最新情况。【原文：Britain's Co-Op Group said its systems were now running normally and there would be improved stock availability in stores and online from this weekend, with all forms of payments working, providing an update on a recently-disclosed cyber incident.】

item.title: AgResource 称，若无中国贸易协议，美国大豆出口或将下降 20
item.description: 农业综合企业咨询公司AgResource周三表示，如果美国和中国未能就限制美国大豆进入其最大市场的贸易争端达成协议，美国大豆出口量可能会下降20%，支付给农民的价格也将暴跌。【原文：U.S. soybean exports may drop 20% and the prices paid to farmers will plunge if the United States and China fail to reach a deal in their trade dispute limiting U.S. soybeans from its largest market, agribusiness consultants AgResource said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦中央银行称，巴基斯坦收到国际货币基金组织（IMF）扩大基金机制的第二笔付款
item.description: 巴基斯坦中央银行周三在 X 上发帖称，巴基斯坦已收到国际货币基金组织根据扩大基金贷款计划提供的第二批特别提款权，价值 7.6 亿美元（10.23 亿美元）。【原文：Pakistan has received the second tranche of special drawing rights worth 760 million ($1,023 million) from the International Monetary Fund under the extended fund facility programme, the country's central bank said in a post on X on Wednesday.】

item.title: 电子巨头富士康第一季度利润同比增长 91
item.description: 全球最大的合约电子制造商台湾富士康周三称，由于人工智能服务器需求持续强劲，第一季度利润飙升 91%。【原文：Taiwan's Foxconn , the world's largest contract electronics maker, on Wednesday said first-quarter profit leapt 91% on continued strong demand for artificial intelligence servers.】

item.title: 比亚迪取代丰田，跃居新加坡汽车销量榜首
item.description: 政府数据显示，中国比亚迪成为新加坡今年迄今为止最受欢迎的汽车品牌，销量首次超过丰田。【原文：China's BYD became the most popular vehicle brand in Singapore so far this year, outselling Toyota for the first time, government data showed, as the fast-growing electric vehicle maker steps up efforts to boost overseas sales.】

item.title: 德国 4 月通胀率确认为 2.2
item.description: 德国联邦统计局周三称，德国4月份通胀率进一步放缓至2.2%，证实了初步数据。【原文：German inflation eased further to 2.2% in April, the federal statistics office said on Wednesday, confirming preliminary data.】

item.title: 巴宝莉全年利润超预期
item.description: 英国奢侈品牌巴宝莉（Burberry）周三公布，截至 3 月 29 日的第四季度销售额和调整后全年营业利润均好于预期，该公司称品牌形象正在改善。【原文：British luxury brand Burberry on Wednesday reported better-than-expected fourth-quarter sales and adjusted operating profit for its full year ending March 29 as it said brand sentiment was improving.】

item.title: 美国高速公路业务带动 Ferrovial 季度核心利润增长 19
item.description: 西班牙建筑巨头 Ferrovial 周二公布，受美国收费高速公路业务强劲表现的推动，该公司第一季度核心盈利增长了 19%。【原文：Spanish construction giant Ferrovial posted a 19% rise in first-quarter core earnings on Tuesday, driven by strong performance in its toll highway business in the United States.】

item.title: 法国《世界报》与人工智能初创公司 Perplexity 建立内容合作关系
item.description: 法国《世界报》周三与美国人工智能公司Perplexity建立了内容合作关系，在竞争加剧的情况下，人工智能初创公司竞相与新闻出版机构达成协议，以改善其产品的反应。【原文：French newspaper Le Monde entered into a content partnership with U.S.-based artificial intelligence company Perplexity on Wednesday, as AI startups compete for deals with news publications to improve the responses of their products amid intensifying competition.】

item.title: 瑞士法院裁定瑞信削减奖金不合法
item.description: 根据周二晚些时候公布的裁决，瑞士一家高级法院裁定，瑞士信贷银行于 2023 年倒闭后，瑞士政府减少和取消支付给该银行前高管的奖金是非法的。【原文：A top Swiss court has ruled that the Swiss government's reductions and cancellations of bonus payments to former executives of Credit Suisse after the bank failed in 2023 were unlawful, according to the ruling published late on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国与哥伦比亚签署 "一带一路 "合作协议
item.description: 中国和哥伦比亚领导人周三在北京会晤后，两国国家媒体称两国已就 "一带一路 "倡议签署了联合合作计划。【原文：China and Colombia have signed a joint cooperation plan on the Belt and Road Initiative, state media said on Wednesday after their leaders met in Beijing.】

item.title: 法国阿托斯公司在新战略计划中设定了年收入 100 亿欧元的目标
item.description: 法国IT集团Atos周三公布了一项新的四年战略计划，目标是在2028年实现高达100亿欧元（110亿美元）的年收入，营业利润率达到10%。【原文：French IT group Atos unveiled a new, four-year strategic plan on Wednesday, aiming for up to 10 billion euros ($11 billion) in annual revenue in 2028, with an operating margin of 10%.】

item.title: Telefonica 在阿根廷和秘鲁注销业务，净亏损 14.5 亿美元
item.description: 西班牙电信公司 Telefonica 周三表示，第一季度净亏损为 13 亿欧元（14.5 亿美元），原因是该公司减记了在秘鲁和阿根廷出售的设备的价值。【原文：Spanish telecom company Telefonica said on Wednesday it booked a net loss of 1.3 billion euros ($1.45 billion) in the first quarter after it wrote down the value of the units it sold in Peru and Argentina.】

item.title: 消息人士称，中国 CATL 将以每股 263 港元的价格在香港上市
item.description: 据两位直接知情人士透露，中国电池生产商 CATL 将在香港上市，每股定价 263 港元（33.70 美元），融资至少 40 亿美元。【原文：Chinese battery maker CATL is set to price its shares at HK$263 ($33.70) each in the company's Hong Kong listing, according to two sources with direct knowledge of the matter, raising at least $4 billion.】

item.title: 阿尔斯通报告年度现金流强劲，预计利润率将有所提高
item.description: 法国火车制造商阿尔斯通（Alstom）周三预计，2025/26 财年的调整后营业利润率将有所上升，此前该公司公布的年度自由现金流远高于市场预期。【原文：French train maker Alstom on Wednesday forecast a rise in its adjusted operating margin for the 2025/26 financial year, after it reported an annual free cash flow well above market expectations.】

item.title: 越南总理誓言打击假冒伪劣和贸易欺诈行为
item.description: 越南政府在一份声明中说，越南总理范明正周三敦促该国的反假冒工作组制定打击假货、贸易欺诈和走私的新方法。【原文：Vietnam's Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh on Wednesday urged the country's anti-counterfeit task force to devise new ways to fight fake goods, trade frauds and smuggling, the government said in a statement.】

item.title: 中国电子商务网站为苹果最新款 iPhone 提供高达 351 美元的折扣优惠
item.description: 由于美国科技巨头苹果公司第一季度在其第二大市场的出货量进一步下滑，中国电子商务平台正在为苹果公司最新的 iPhone 16 机型提供高达 2,530 元（351 美元）的折扣，以刺激销售。【原文：Chinese e-commerce platforms are offering discounts of up to 2,530 yuan ($351) on Apple's latest iPhone 16 models, an effort to spur sales as first-quarter shipments by the U.S. tech giant fell further in its second-largest market.】

item.title: 维权组织就使用欧盟数据进行人工智能培训一事向 Meta 公司发出禁令威胁
item.description: 奥地利权益组织 NOYB 周三表示，如果科技巨头继续实施使用欧洲人的个人数据来训练其人工智能模型的计划，该组织将寻求针对 Meta Platforms 的禁令，可能导致数十亿欧元的损害赔偿要求。【原文：Austrian advocacy group NOYB said on Wednesday it would seek an injunction against Meta Platforms that could lead to billion-euro damages claims if the tech giant goes ahead with plans to use Europeans' personal data to train its artificial intelligence models.】

item.title: 英国太空锻造公司在北约创新基金的支持下融资 3000 万美元
item.description: 英国太空技术公司 Space Forge 周三宣布，在北约创新基金（NATO Innovation Fund）的牵头下筹集了 2260 万英镑（约合 2980 万美元）的资金，凸显了快速发展的太空技术领域对投资者的吸引力。【原文：British space technology company Space Forge announced on Wednesday a 22.6 million pound ($29.8 million) fundraising led by the NATO Innovation Fund, highlighting the appeal of the fast-growing space technology sector for investors.】

item.title: 独家报道特斯拉将恢复运送中国零部件，用于在美国生产 Cybercab 和 Semi
item.description: 一位知情人士透露，在中美两国就关税问题达成停战协议后，特斯拉计划从本月底开始从中国向美国运输用于生产 Cybercab 和 Semi 卡车的零部件。【原文：Tesla plans to start shipping components from China to the U.S. for the production of Cybercab and Semi trucks from the end of this month, after the U.S. and China reached a truce over tariffs, said a person with direct knowledge.】

item.title: 机器中的幽灵？在中国变频器中发现恶意通信设备
item.description: 美国能源官员正在重新评估在可再生能源基础设施中发挥关键作用的中国制造设备所带来的风险，因为有两位熟悉此事的人士说，在一些设备中发现了不明通信设备。【原文：U.S. energy officials are reassessing the risk posed by Chinese-made devices that play a critical role in renewable energy infrastructure after unexplained communication equipment was found inside some of them, two people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 聚焦：欧洲各国政府争相解读特朗普的新药品定价令
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普发布降低美国药品价格的行政命令后，欧洲各国政府正在研究美国总统唐纳德-特朗普是否可以迫使它们为处方药支付更多费用，这激怒了全球制药业。【原文：European governments are examining whether U.S. President Donald Trump can force them to pay more for prescription medicines, after he issued an executive order to lower U.S. drug prices, roiling the global pharmaceutical industry.】

item.title: 早间竞价：贸易协议有望达成，市场接近平衡点
item.description: 洛基-斯威夫特对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rocky Swift】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，特斯拉董事会为首席执行官埃隆-马斯克探讨新的薪酬协议
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周三报道，特斯拉董事会已经成立了一个特别委员会来探讨首席执行官埃隆-马斯克的薪酬问题，这可能会导致他获得新的一揽子股票期权。【原文：Tesla's board has formed a special committee to explore CEO Elon Musk's pay, which could lead to him being offered a fresh package of stock options, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚交易所运营商就可能裁员启动咨询程序
item.description: 澳大利亚证券交易所运营商澳大利亚证券交易所（ASX）周三表示，该公司已开始就可能的裁员进行磋商，因为在监管压力不断增加的情况下，该公司正加大力度降低成本。【原文：Australian stock exchange operator ASX said on Wednesday it had begun consulting on potential job cuts as it ramps up efforts to lower costs amid mounting regulatory pressure.】

item.title: 索尼今年利润持平
item.description: 索尼公司周三表示，预计在截至今年 3 月的财年中，营业利润将增长 0.3%，达到 1.28 万亿日元（约合 87.0 亿美元）。【原文：Sony said on Wednesday it expects operating profit to rise 0.3% to 1.28 trillion yen ($8.70 billion) in the financial year ending in March.】

item.title: 加密货币平台 FalconX 与渣打银行合作
item.description: 加密货币主经纪商 FalconX 和全球银行渣打银行周三表示，他们已结成战略合作伙伴关系，为机构加密货币投资者提供服务。【原文：Crypto prime broker FalconX and global bank Standard Chartered said on Wednesday they had formed a strategic partnership to serve institutional crypto investors.】

item.title: 投资者考虑关税休战，股市微涨，美元挣扎
item.description: 周三，亚洲股市上扬，美元则摇摆不定，原因是相对温和的美国通胀数据为美联储今年晚些时候降息的前景提供了支撑，尽管投资者仍在衡量贸易冲突最糟糕的时期是否已经过去。【原文：Stocks edged up in Asia on Wednesday while the dollar wobbled as relatively benign U.S. inflation data fed into prospects of rate cuts by the Federal Reserve later this year even as investors were still gauging if the worst of the trade conflicts was over.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：百度准备在欧洲推出无人驾驶出租车
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二报道，中国科技巨头百度正准备首次在欧洲测试其无人驾驶打车服务 Apollo Go。【原文：Chinese technology giant Baidu is preparing to test its driverless ride-hailing service, Apollo Go, in Europe for the first time, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday.】
